text: Horst Scheeser (24 June 1912 - 10 April 1998) was a Romanian alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Romanian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Romania Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brașov
title: Horst Scheeser
